attributes.action: KEEP SEYMOUR ROAD SUB POST OFFICE TROWBRIDGE OPEN
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The access to the office for the elderly and disabled is easy with five parking places directly outside the double door with 10 more within 20 meters: The office serves local businesses on a busy trading estate and the town, a hospital, an elderly residential home a doctors’ surgery plus the residents: 5 other offices have already been closed in the town many of their clients now use it: It's easy for passing trade to stop: There is an ATM within the building: Two customer terminals with the option for a third: Due to it’s close proximity to the main office, much of the over flow clienteles use it as the queues there are often taking more than half an hour and often up to an hour with elderly customers standing outside in the cold and rain: 40% of the shops trade is from the post office customers passing through: It would only be a matter of time before the local shop closed due to the knock on effect.
